data.news_body: Art Nirman Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Art Nirman Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Art Nirman Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Art Nirman Limited has informed the Exchange regarding  Board meeting held on November 12, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Art Nirman Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Art Nirman Limited has informed the Exchange regarding  Board meeting held on November 12, 2025.

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Art Nirman Limited has submitted the Exchange a copy Srutinizers report of  Postal Ballot

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The ART Nirman Limited informed the Exchange that the Board Meeting dated 17.10.2025 concluded and considered to obtain one or more financial facilities aggregating to the extent of Term Loan ofRs.130,00,00,000/- ( Rupees One Hundred Thirty Crores Only) from Kotak Mahindra Investments Limited and to create Charge thereon

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The ART Nirman Limited informed the Exchange that the Board Meeting dated 17.10.2025 concluded and considered to obtain one or more financial facilities aggregating to the extent of Term Loan ofRs.130,00,00,000/- ( Rupees One Hundred Thirty Crores Only) from Kotak Mahindra Investments Limited and to create Charge thereon

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The ART Nirman Limited informed the Exchange that the Board Meeting dated 17.10.2025 concluded and considered to obtain one or more financial facilities aggregating to the extent of Term Loan ofRs.130,00,00,000/- ( Rupees One Hundred Thirty Crores Only) from Kotak Mahindra Investments Limited and to create Charge thereon
